brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts an activity in which you must decide if the following features belong to RIP or EIGRP.

One.Uses only the hop count metric
Two.Maximum limit of 15 hops
Three.Has an administrative distance of 120
Four.Broadcast or multicasts updates every 30 seconds
Five.Only version 2 supports VLSM and classless routing
Six.Uses a composite metric
Seven.Sends hello packets
Eight.Maintains multiple tables
Nine.Maximum limit of 255 hops
Ten.Forms neighbor adjacencies
